section1.title: My name is Leonardo Carlassare and I'm a Software Engineer
section1.subtitle: I like coding, working on new projects and learning new things every day.

section2.title: Hi! Nice to meet you
section2.subtitle: A brief self-introduction: I graduated in 2022 in Computer Engineering MSc at the University of Padua. Currently I'm working as a Frontend Developer for Sysdata S.p.A.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Collectionite is a web application for european cards collectioners that could track automatically cards prices for them and it was also a social network for people with the same passion. We began a collaboration with the german company CardMarket using their APIs for gathering datas. The development process ended in June 2021
